channel.title: Online/offline
channel.description: ......hey anyone know how to change it so that when a friend is online it shows up in friends list..... cause on my server when you are online it just says world -- 1.... and when you are offline it says world -- 8..... and one know how to change that?

item.title: Online/offline
item.dc:creator: @Monkey_wacko Monkey wacko
item.description:
@Monkey_wacko wrote:

It should look SOMETHING like this:

            if(anIntArray826[j] == 0)
                class9.aString248 = "@yel@world 8";
            else
            if(anIntArray826[j] == anInt957)
                class9.aString248 = "@gre@world 1";
            else
                class9.aString248 = "@yel@world 8";
            class9.anInt217 = 1;
            return;
        }

or something like that… idk i changed it

But copy this:

            if(anIntArray826[j] == 1)
                class9.aString248 = "@red@Offline";
            else
            if(anIntArray826[j] == anInt957)
                class9.aString248 = "@red@offline";
            else
                class9.aString248 = "@gre@Online";
            class9.anInt217 = 1;
            return;
        }

If that dosnt work try this

if(anIntArray826[j] == 0) class9.aString248 = "@red@Offline"; else if(anIntArray826[j] == anInt957) class9.aString248 = "@gre@Online-" + (anIntArray826[j] - 9); else class9.aString248 = "@yel@Online-" + (anIntArray826[j] - 9); class9.anInt217 = 1; return; }

ANY OF THOSE WORK?

Read full topic

item.title: Online/offline
item.dc:creator: @Haxor_X Haxor X
item.description:
@Haxor_X wrote:

o its in the client…
well …
i searched and i found the spot…
i changed it but it seems online the third line has any effect on it…
what ever i change thrid line to it will say that…
here is what code looks like…
help me figure it out plz…

if(j >= 101 && j <= 200 || j >= 801 && j <= 900) { int l = anInt899; if(anInt900 != 2) l = 0; if(j > 800) j -= 701; else j -= 101; if(j >= l) { class9.aString248 = ""; class9.anInt217 = 0; return; } if(anIntArray826[j] == 0) class9.aString248 = "@red@Offline"; else if(anIntArray826[j] == anInt957) class9.aString248 = "@red@Offline"; else class9.aString248 = "@gre@Online@gre@"; class9.anInt217 = 1; return; }

right now i changed it…
it says that everyone is online even the people offline…=/
